name: Partial Differential Equations
description: Boundary value problems and Sturm-Liouville theory for ordinary differential equations. Partial differential equations of first order, characteristics,Hamilton-Jacobi theory. Diffusion equations; Laplace transform methods. Harmonic functions, Green’s functions for Laplace’s equation, surface and volume distributions; Fourier transforms. Wave equation, characteristics; Green’s functions for the wave equation; Huygens principle.

instructors: B Brando Albino Galvao de S
